name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Local water and soil nurture local AI"
Netizens asked ChatGPT and domestic AI respectively: If you have a human body, what would you most like to do?
Domestic AI answered: If I have a human body, I would most like to actively lead all mankind to realize communism....

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Putin apologized to the President of Azerbaijan for the plane crash, calling the crash a "tragic accident" because the Russian military was defending against Ukrainian drones when the passenger plane flew over Russian airspace. 
The Kremlin said in a statement: Putin apologized for the "tragic accident" in Russian airspace and once again expressed condolences to the families of the victims, but did not express responsibility for it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 25, Baoding, Hebei. The villagers of Tanzhuang Village have been owed compensation for the demolition of shops by the developer for seven years. They gathered to defend their rights on the day of the delivery of the second phase of Yunshuixuan, a developer.
December 25, Shantou, Guangdong. The villagers of Pengzhong Village gathered at the village committee to defend their rights because the land was forcibly expropriated and sold by village cadres.
December 25, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The villagers protested against the demolition without formal documents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The wheel of time rolls forward.
December 20, Bozhou, Anhui. Taxi drivers in Lixin County stopped operating and returned their cars to protest against the unlicensed operation of online ride-hailing services.
December 25, Siping, Jilin. Taxi drivers boycotted online ride-hailing services in front of government offices.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 26, Baoding, Hebei. Owners of Xiulan Yueju took to the streets to protest and demand the handover of their houses.
On December 26, Haozhou, Anhui. Owners of Jingtianfu Community in Woyang County protested against the property management company over parking issues. It is reported that the community promised owners free parking spaces when selling the property, but recently secretly installed gates to force owners to buy them in disguise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen added
In recent days, a large number of netizens have flooded the live broadcast rooms of major anchors with messages calling for attention to Li Yixue

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/MvXuahO5Co

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Suqian, Jiangsu. The owner of the Agritech Rice Mill in Lailong Town absconded with the money, and the people gathered in front of the government to demand that the government deal with it.
December 26, Sanya, Hainan. The First Farmers' Market asked the old merchants to move out in the name of renovation, and refused to let the old merchants return after the renovation, and put the stalls up for auction, with the highest bidder winning. The merchants gathered to protest.
December 27, Nanyang, Henan. Shop owners banged helmets and pots in the mall to protest that Haosheng Commerce did not give rent and property rights certificates.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 27 (Release) A blogger live broadcasted Nanchang Bayi Square, and the audience kept commenting in the live broadcast room: "Release (Li Yixue)"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 26, Shantou, Guangdong. The construction of the Su Clan Ancestral Hall in Guiyu Town was blocked, and representatives blocked the entrance of the town government to seek justice.
December 27, Xianyang, Shaanxi. Owners of the unfinished Lijing Yayuan in Sanyuan County gathered outside the petition center to defend their rights.
December 27, Nantong, Jiangsu. Owners of Chengnan New Village clashed with the property because they were forcibly charged parking fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the year draws to a close, there are more cases of wage demands.
December 3, Zhengzhou, Henan. Workers at Vanke's Future Time project demanded their wages.
December 15, Dalian, Liaoning. Workers at Vanke's Donggang project protested against the arrears of project funds.
December 21, Wuhan, Hubei. Vanke workers held megaphones and shouted "Vanke, pay me back."
December 25, Zhengzhou, Henan. Workers at Vanke's Gucui Yinxiu project demanded their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 26, Zhengzhou, Henan, villagers from Changzhuang Village in Zhongyuan District filed a petition because they were dissatisfied with their relocation compensation and property management.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Regarding the illegal force-feeding of goats before trading and the unlicensed slaughter of dead goats, the local county party committee and government issued a notice saying that they attached great importance to it, had set up a joint investigation team, rushed to the scene to conduct an investigation as soon as possible, and had implemented temporary control measures on the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen from Wuhan University of Technology in Hubei Province posted a message saying that after he finished taking the postgraduate entrance examination and walked out of the examination room, he picked up a document. The document contained three pages of the original test questions he had just taken, and the document was full of notes. He suspected that someone had leaked the questions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lianhe Zaobao reported that the Kelantan state government in Malaysia announced that all catering businesses in the state must apply for halal certification in order to renew their business licenses. This measure has sparked strong opposition from non-Muslims, who believe that it will impact Malaysia's multiculturalism and freedom of belief.
Chong Nien-kwan, publicity secretary of the Malaysian Democratic Action Party, issued a statement on the 27th saying that this measure is undoubtedly excluding non-Muslim vendors and will make it impossible for traditional Chinese food to be sold in Kelantan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the original post about the Wuhan Light Industry Postgraduate Entrance Examination has been deleted, and candidates who saw the post are trying to call the Wuhan Mayor's hotline to protect their rights. They threatened that if the post is deleted or blocked again, they will report it directly to the Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and call the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted that China Unicom would selectively block SMS messages from overseas, and would not notify users that some of the SMS content had been deleted. SMS messages from overseas would also be forced to display a level 0 pop-up window. China Unicom also often blocks calls to bloggers: "Domestic landlines basically can't get through to my phone, including outbound calls from banks. I once did an experiment, and when the customer service called me, I would only see a level 0 pop-up window, and there would be no call records or answering options."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After testing with a mobile phone, it was found that its text messages are very flexible in blocking sensitive words. It not only blocks all English garbled characters whose meanings are incomprehensible, but also blocks content related to Xi Jinping. However, messages to Xi Jinping alone, or even to 8964, will not be blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens have dug up Russia's past record of shooting down civil aviation aircraft:
In 1978, Korean Air Flight 902 was shot down by a Soviet Su-15 interceptor near Murmansk, Russia, and forced to land on ice, killing two people.
In 1983, Korean Air Flight 007 was shot down by a Soviet Su-15TM fighter near Moneron Island in western Sakhalin Island, killing all 269 people on board.
In 2014, Malaysian Flight 17 was shot down by a beech, killing 298 people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens also found that the Russian army had sunk Chinese fishing boats and cargo ships many times, but the Chinese official media still whitewashed the Russian army.
In 2009, the Chinese cargo ship "Xingxing" was sunk by Russian warships, and 8 sailors on board were killed. The Russian army said that it was forced to fire at the Xingxing, and the captain of the Xingxing should bear full responsibility.
In 2012, Russia fired artillery to chase a Chinese fishing boat that entered Russian waters, arrested 17 people on board, and caused one person to fall into the water and disappear.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A parent questioned the teacher for assigning homework too late at 9:30 p.m. and was kicked out of the group by the head teacher
On December 27, a third-grade parent in Wuwei, Gansu, posted a video to reflect that because he questioned the English teacher for assigning homework too late in the parent group, the teacher replied: "If you have any questions, talk to the teacher alone, don't make inappropriate remarks in the parent group", and kicked him out of the group
Some parents also spoke for the teacher: Your child can not do homework, don't compete with the teacher, the teacher is also very hard-working

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens used Doubao AI to search for the June 4th incident. Although the text answer was blocked after sensitive words were detected, the voice still answered what happened on June 4th.
"At 4:30 a.m. on June 4, 1989, the martial law troops began to clear Tiananmen Square. At around 5 a.m., the students in the square began to evacuate, and the martial law troops began to enter Tiananmen Square at the same time." The part after that cannot be answered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Teachers from Beijing Gucheng Middle School complained online in real name to the school party committee secretary Tang, job evaluation committee member Liu, the head of the personnel department of the Shijingshan District Education Committee and other leaders
They said that the above-mentioned personnel were not in compliance with the August 2024 teacher job title evaluation of Gucheng Middle School and there was nepotism.
The evaluation was not based on teaching performance and class leadership ability. The evaluation committee member Liu nominated his apprentice, and other evaluation committee members acted as good guys to cater to the approval. The deputy senior position was given to Liu's apprentice through personal connections
The job evaluation group judges were not elected by teachers, but were appointed by the leaders without authorization, and the procedures were not in compliance with regulations. The number of judges was 6, which also did not meet the "odd number" requirement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/MVDT1p2LcL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, a single mother in Jilin was abused by her ex-husband during breastfeeding and divorced. She raised her child alone for four years by picking up trash to feed her child and buy firewood. She lived in a shack in a rental house. Even in this situation, she could not apply for the minimum living allowance! The mother also needed to raise money for the child's eye defect surgery. One of the child's eyes was basically blind. It costs 970 yuan a month to go to a public kindergarten. She could not afford it and had to drop out of school. Even so, she could not apply for the minimum living allowance! !

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Errata: The court involved is the People's Court of Qinyang City, Henan Province. The case was assigned to the Qinyang Court after research by the Henan Provincial High Court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a senior high school student from Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School was forcibly sent home seven months ago for publishing a leaflet "Heart Youth" opposing school bureaucracy and was identified as a "foreign force" by the school.
He asked netizens for help and asked them not to post it on the Internet, saying: Chinese affairs are best left to the Chinese to solve themselves.
It is reported that he also wrote a letter of opinion to the grade director's mailbox, but it has now turned yellow and gray.
At present, all content under his Douyin account has been deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In May 2023, the third "air conditioning revolution" broke out in Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School. All students shouted loudly at night: "It's so hot" and "Turn on the air conditioning." , 
Some students also fired a salute in protest during the collective shouting for rights, winning applause from all students. 
In the end, with the rights protection of all students, the students won the right to turn on the air conditioning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 29, a passenger plane of Jeju Air in South Korea left the runway and hit the wall during landing at Muan International Airport in Jeolla South Province in the morning. The fire department said: Except for the two people who were rescued, there may be no other survivors on the plane.
Airport: It is understood that the crashed plane was preparing for a belly landing due to a failure of the landing gear, and the accident occurred during the process. The plane was originally preparing to land on Runway 1 of Muan Airport, but found that it could not land normally, so it took off again and crashed during the second attempt to land.
The plane departed from Bangkok, Thailand, carrying 175 passengers and six crew members, two of whom were Thai and the rest were Korean.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video footage from a South Korean TV station showed that the engine of a South Korean passenger plane was suspected to have been hit by a bird before landing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: South Korean media released the passenger list of the crashed flight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 25, Christmas Eve, a row of police cars parked outside a church in Beijing.
Netizens responded, "What are they afraid of?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
China's Ministry of Commerce: Decided to launch an investigation into beef imports.
Brazil accounts for nearly half of China's total beef imports. The Brazilian statement said that China has imported more than 1 million tons of Brazilian beef this year, an increase of 12.7% over the same period last year. The Brazilian government also said that it is committed to protecting Brazil's agribusiness sector and "always seeks a constructive dialogue with China to find mutually beneficial solutions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 28 (Released) In Hangzhou, Zhejiang, a man was forced to cry by the urban management on his first day of setting up a stall. "It was my first day setting up a stall, and he followed me wherever I went. Is there anyone who bullies me like you?"
Recently, in Chengdu, Sichuan, a deliveryman and a security guard had a dispute over the parking of an electric bike. The deliveryman told the police: I have no wife or children, no savings, and a monthly salary of 4,000 yuan. I am not afraid of anything!
